update tab_pb_lead_team
org_id = #{orgId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
session_year = #{sessionYear,jdbcType=BIGINT},
change_date = #{changeDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
during_year = #{duringYear,jdbcType=BIGINT},
vote_type = #{voteType,jdbcType=BIGINT},
due_count = #{dueCount,jdbcType=BIGINT},

elected_time = #{electedTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
comm_mem_num = #{commMemNum,jdbcType=BIGINT},

standing_mem_num = #{standingMemNum,jdbcType=BIGINT},
back_mem_num = #{backMemNum,jdbcType=BIGINT},

where lead_team_id = #{leadTeamId,jdbcType=BIGINT}

update tab_pb_lead_team set org_id = #{orgId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, session_year = #{sessionYear,jdbcType=BIGINT}, change_date = #{changeDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, during_year = #{duringYear,jdbcType=BIGINT}, vote_type = #{voteType,jdbcType=BIGINT}, due_count = #{dueCount,jdbcType=BIGINT}, fact_count = #{factCount,jdbcType=BIGINT}, vote_count = #{voteCount,jdbcType=BIGINT}, valid_vote_count = #{validVoteCount,jdbcType=BIGINT}, current = #{current,jdbcType=TINYINT}, elected_type = #{electedType,jdbcType=BIGINT}, elected_time = #{electedTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, comm_mem_num = #{commMemNum,jdbcType=BIGINT}, comm_num_parttime = #{commNumParttime,jdbcType=BIGINT}, parttime_comm_num = #{parttimeCommNum,jdbcType=BIGINT}, standing_mem_num = #{standingMemNum,jdbcType=BIGINT}, back_mem_num = #{backMemNum,jdbcType=BIGINT}, ebl_flag = #{eblFlag,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, del_flag = #{delFlag,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, order_num = #{orderNum,jdbcType=BIGINT}, description = #{description,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, create_userid = #{createUserid,jdbcType=BIGINT}, create_username = #{createUsername,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, update_userid = #{updateUserid,jdbcType=BIGINT}, update_username = #{updateUsername,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, version = #{version,jdbcType=BIGINT}, vote_status = #{voteStatus,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR} vote_result = #{voteResult,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR} where lead_team_id = #{leadTeamId,jdbcType=BIGINT}

update tab_pb_lead_team set org_id = #{orgId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, session_year = #{sessionYear,jdbcType=BIGINT}, change_date = #{changeDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, during_year = #{duringYear,jdbcType=BIGINT}, vote_type = #{voteType,jdbcType=BIGINT}, due_count = #{dueCount,jdbcType=BIGINT}, fact_count = #{factCount,jdbcType=BIGINT}, vote_count = #{voteCount,jdbcType=BIGINT}, valid_vote_count = #{validVoteCount,jdbcType=BIGINT}, current = #{current,jdbcType=TINYINT}, elected_type = #{electedType,jdbcType=BIGINT}, elected_time = #{electedTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, comm_mem_num = #{commMemNum,jdbcType=BIGINT}, comm_num_parttime = #{commNumParttime,jdbcType=BIGINT}, parttime_comm_num = #{parttimeCommNum,jdbcType=BIGINT}, standing_mem_num = #{standingMemNum,jdbcType=BIGINT}, back_mem_num = #{backMemNum,jdbcType=BIGINT}, ebl_flag = #{eblFlag,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, del_flag = #{delFlag,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, order_num = #{orderNum,jdbcType=BIGINT}, description = #{description,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, create_userid = #{createUserid,jdbcType=BIGINT}, create_username = #{createUsername,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, update_userid = #{updateUserid,jdbcType=BIGINT}, update_username = #{updateUsername,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, version = #{version,jdbcType=BIGINT} vote_result=#{voteResult,jdbcType=BIGINT} where lead_team_id = #{leadTeamId,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select:
SELECT l.*, d.NAME AS org_name, d.orgnize_master AS person_name, d.orgnize_master,
ifnull( lt.class_num, 0 ) AS class_num, ifnull( t.img_num, 0 ) AS img_num, ifnull( t.doc_num, 0 ) AS doc_num FROM tab_pb_lead_team l LEFT JOIN sys_dept d ON l.org_id = d.dept_id LEFT JOIN ( SELECT user_id, lead_team_id, count( 1 ) AS class_num FROM tab_pb_lead_team_member WHERE del_flag=0 GROUP BY lead_team_id ) lt USING ( lead_team_id ) LEFT JOIN ( SELECT host_id, sum( CASE attachment_file_type WHEN 58992 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END ) AS img_num, sum( CASE attachment_file_type WHEN 58993 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END ) AS doc_num FROM tab_pb_attachment a WHERE a.del_flag = 0 AND attachment_type = 2 GROUP BY a.host_id ) t ON t.host_id = l.lead_team_id WHERE l.del_flag = 0
AND d.name like CONCAT('%',#{orgName},'%')
and ll.leadname like CONCAT('%',#{personName},'%') or (d.orgnize_master like CONCAT('%',#{personName},'%'))
AND ll.idcard like CONCAT('%',#{idCardNo},'%')
AND (d.dept_id = #{rangeDeptId} OR d.parent_id = #{rangeDeptId})
AND find_in_set(#{rangeDeptId}, d.full_path)
AND d.dept_id = #{rangeDeptId}
mapper.update: update tab_pb_lead_team set del_flag=1 where lead_team_id = #{leadTeamId,jdbcType=BIGINT}
update tab_pb_lead_team set comm_num_parttime =comm_num_parttime + 1 where lead_team_id = #{leadTeamId,jdbcType=BIGINT}
update tab_pb_lead_team set comm_num_parttime = #{count} where lead_team_id = #{leadTeamId,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select: select comm_mem_num from tab_pb_lead_team where lead_team_id = #{leadTeamId,jdbcType=BIGINT}
